markdownRemark.excerpt: Recently I came across an interesting problem of building an API rate limiter. Some of the popular algorithms to implement rate limiting are…
markdownRemark.html:
Recently I came across an interesting problem of building an API rate limiter.

Some of the popular algorithms to implement rate limiting are:

  • Token bucket
  • Leaky bucket
  • Fixed window counter
  • Sliding window log
  • Sliding window counter

This post is NOT about these algorithms. I will try and explain an alternative approach here.

References

- https://medium.com/@saisandeepmopuri/system-design-rate-limiter-and-data-modelling-9304b0d18250

frontmatter.title: 🚧 An alternative approach to building an API rate limiter using NodeJS and Redis
